required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fibersol-2 Clinical Trials Related to Appetite
clinical_study.official_title: Fibersol-2 Clinical Trials Related to Appetite

brief_summary.textblock: Emerging research suggests fiber, particularly digestion-resistant maltodextrins such as Fibersol-2, may impact satiety, by decreasing hunger, prolonging satiation, and/or increasing satiety signals from the gut. This research aims to determine whether or not Fibersol-2 may impact satiety, by decreasing hunger, prolonging satiation, and/or increasing satiety signals from the gut.

primary_outcome.measure: Visual analog scale questionnaire subjective satiety responses
primary_outcome.description: Hunger survey (30 minutes before meal and every half hour for 4 hours postprandial) (analogue scores)

secondary_outcome.description: subjects recorded incidents and severity of gastrointestinal symptoms post treatment over 24 h

arm_group.description: On the day before the test, subjects need to consume their evening meal before 9 pm, and fast until the start of the test the next day. The evening meal will be a standardized meal for all subjects (11). They are allowed to consume water up until 1 hr before the test. Before the start of the test a cannula will be inserted into the ante-cubital arm vein for use of repeated blood sampling (11). The beverage will be consumed at 10 am. Blood samples will be taken at specified time points prior to after the treatments.

On the day before the test, subjects need to consume their evening meal before 9 pm, and fast until the start of the test the next day. The evening meal will be a standardized meal for all subjects. They are allowed to consume water up until 1 hr before the test. Before the start of the test a cannula will be inserted into the ante-cubital arm vein for use of repeated blood sampling (11). The beverage will be consumed at 10 am. Blood samples will be taken at specified time points prior to and after the treatments. Ingredient only test will be done without the meal to determine independent effects of Fibersol-2.

On the day before the test, subjects need to consume their evening meal before 9 pm, and fast until the start of the test the next day. The evening meal will be a standardized meal for all subjects. They are allowed to consume water up until 1 hr before the test. Before the start of the test a cannula will be inserted into the ante-cubital arm vein for use of repeated blood sampling. The test meal and beverage will be consumed at 10 am. The meal will consist of pasta meal (main pasta dish = Carb 64.5%, Fat 17.7%, Protein 17.8%; total kcal 739). Tea containing test materials will accompany the meal. Blood samples will be taken at specified time points prior to and after the treatments.

arm_group.arm_group_label: tea with 5 g fibersol-2 and meal

intervention.arm_group_label: tea with 5 g fibersol-2 and meal
tea with 10 g fibersol-2 and meal

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
i. No known food allergies
ii. Normal healthy individuals
iii. No food intake abnormalities or abnormal feeding behaviors
iv. Average American BMI (21-28)
